meanings.definition: Of or relating to the ilium.
meanings.sent1: The doctor pointed out the iliac bone on the X-ray.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sharp pain in her iliac region after the fall.
meanings.sent3: The iliac bone decided to take a break from supporting the body.
meanings.sent4: Her iliac bone was as sturdy as a fortress wall.
meanings.sent5: The iliac bone, like a loyal soldier, stood strong through every movement.

meanings.sent1: He studied the structure of the iliac in anatomy class.
meanings.sent2: The iliac forms part of the pelvis.
meanings.sent3: The iliac bone threw a party for the other bones in the body.
meanings.sent4: Her iliac bone was a cornerstone of her strength.
meanings.sent5: The iliac, a key piece in the body's puzzle, supported her every step.
